title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 600.17 - Fees of the clerk of the court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 600.17 - Fees of the clerk of the court

State Regulations
(a) In addition to the fees provided for in section
1250.17
of this Title, pursuant to

Judiciary Law section 265, the clerk of the court is entitled to receive in
advance the following fees on behalf of the State of New York: (1)
for an embossed and engraved certificate
of admission as an attorney and counselor at law, $25; (2)
for a certificate of good standing, $10; (3)
for furnishing a hard or
digital copy, certified or uncertified, of an opinion, decision, order, record, or other paper in his or her custody, $1 for the first page and 50 cents for
each additional page; and
(4)
no
charge shall be made for furnishing a copy of the order, opinion or decision of
the court to any party to an appeal or proceeding pending in the
court. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
600.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
